content: *** this pattern is participating in the winter wonders blog hop and for today november 14 2022 only you can get the pdf for free follow this affiliate link to enter the blog hop https //malloo14--itchinforsomestitchin thrivecart com/winter-wonders-2022/63572040fe94a/ the dark matter shawl is a romantic crochet crescent shawl that will steal your heart crescent shawls are ideal for wearing around your neck or inside of a jacket as a big scarf without having to deal with the huge point of a triangle scarf it has a great length without being too deep dimensions 18 x71 46x180 cm it is worked from top to bottom with a simple single_crochet edging and some picots
